Package index

Main API

Functions responsible for producing an estimation plot. They have been sequentially organised for their intended procedural utilisation.

load()
Loading data with dabestr
mean_diff() median_diff() cohens_d() hedges_g() cliffs_delta() cohens_h()
Calculating effect sizes
dabest_plot()
Producing an estimation plot
forest_plot()
Generates a Forest Plot

Adjusting plot aesthetics

plot_kwargs
Adjustable Plot Aesthetics
